thread.title: James Arthur's 'secret girlfriend' revealed - and it's his ex
thread.title_full: James Arthur's 'secret girlfriend' revealed - and it's his ex

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: James Arthur's 'secret girlfriend' revealed - and it's his ex
text:
James Arthur and dancer Jessica Grist are still a couple Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
James Arthur has confirmed he’s still with his ex-girlfriend Jessica Grist, after keeping his relationship under wraps for the past few months. 
The 2012 X Factor winner had previously said he wouldn’t speak out about his romantic life, but has now opened up about Jessica, who he previously dated two years ago but hooked up with again last year. 
“I’m still seeing Jess,” he told The Sun . “I don’t like to talk about it too much just because we’ve been through so much. I do worry I’m not there enough and at the moment it’s kind of like that. James and Jessica first met on The X Factor in 2012 (Photo: Getty) James has thanked Jessica for helping him through his darkest days (Photo: WENN.com) 
“We’re going through a period where she’d on tour and I’m on tour. Jess is really special. She looked after me when I was at my very lowest. 
“She’s been the most important person throughout this.” 
James' UK tour begins next month, while Jess is dancing on The X Factor tour around the country. James and Jessica met when he was on the The X Factor just over four years ago. James at the BRITs on Wednesday (Photo: Rex Features) James when he won The X Factor in 2012 (Photo: ITV) 
On Friday, James also opened up about the traumatising moment he was glassed by a jealous thug over a one night stand with the man's ex. 
The 2012 X Factor champion has opened up about the "disturbing" assault by Chris Revell - who was jailed for five and a half years earlier this month for the incident - which saw him attacked with a pint glass and punched to the ground. 
"It was an ordeal. It was tough to see footage of it," James told The Sun. "It was quite disturbing to see it. I'm glad it's behind me. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
